front.title: Problem Statement and Gap Analysis for Connecting to Cloud DCs via Optical Networks

abstract.t: Optical networking technologies such as fine-grain OTN (fgOTN) enable premium cloud-based services, including optical leased line, cloud Virtual Reality (cloud-VR), and computing to be carried end-to-end optically between applications and cloud data centers (DCs), offering premium quality and deterministic performance. This document describes the problem statement and requirements for accessing cloud services through optical networks. It also discusses technical gaps for IETF-developed management and control protocols to support service provisioning and management in such an all-optical network scenario.
